translations: v.（使）醒悟（disillusion 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: This has got to be disillusioning!
sentences.translation: 这肯定会让幻梦觉醒的！

sentences.sentence: It was always a fantasy, of course, and Brown did not waste much time in disillusioning them.
sentences.translation: 它一直是幻想，当然，布朗并没有浪费太多时间在他们失望的。

sentences.sentence: Wasting time joining bogus sites or finding that they want money after all can be quite a disillusioning experience.
sentences.translation: 浪费时间加入假网站或找到他们想要的钱后，都可以相当失望的经验。
